FuncDef:
The mpls te self-ping duration command is used to configure the global self-ping duration time. When the duration time value is 65535s, there is no limit to the duration time.
The undo mpls te self-ping duration command is used to restore the default configuration.
By default, the global self-ping duration is 1800 second.

ParaDef.Info:
Configure the global self-ping duration time.
The value is from 60 to 65535, in second.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When self-ping is disable under the RSVP TE P2P tunnel interface, the global duration time is used.
When self-ping is enable under the RSVP TE P2P tunnel interface, the RSVP TE P2P tunnel interface duration time is used.
